text: Can you please help me register a new account?
Sure, I can help you with that. What would you like your username to be?
And what would you like your password to be?
Finally, what is your email address?
Great. Let me register your account now. [RegisterUser(username='user4', password='password4', email='user4@example.com')]
Done. Your account has been successfully registered. Is there anything else I can help you with?
You're welcome. Have a great day!
